title: BMI Calculator
metaDescription: Free BMI Calculator - Calculate your body mass index using metric or imperial system. Know your ideal healthy weight.

disclaimer.title: ⚠️ Important: BMI Limitations
disclaimer.point1: BMI does not distinguish between muscle mass and body fat
disclaimer.point2: It does not consider fat distribution or body composition
disclaimer.point3: May not be accurate for athletes, elderly, pregnant women or children
disclaimer.point4: Consult with a healthcare professional for a complete and personalized assessment
disclaimer.asianNote: Note: Asian populations have lower BMI thresholds because they have a higher body fat percentage at the same BMI.

privacy.note: Your data is not stored or sent anywhere. All calculations are performed locally in your browser.
